sentences.english: MethodsA random, single-blind parallel study was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用隨機單盲對照實驗方法。

sentences.english: DESIGN A randomized controlled study and evaluation by single blind.
sentences.chinese: 隨機對照實驗，單盲法評估。

sentences.english: The experimental models that transected sciatic nerve in rats with proximal simple blind tube.
sentences.chinese: 採用切斷大鼠坐骨神經近端套接單盲管的實驗模型。

sentences.english: MethodsA prospective randomized single-blind clinical study of the control method.
sentences.chinese: 方法以前瞻性的隨機單盲對照法進行臨牀研究。

sentences.english: Methods(It was) a randomized, single-blind, parallel controlled and multiple center trial design.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用隨機單盲平行對照多中心試驗方法。
